For sale comfortable apartment in Pirita directly from the owner.
The area of the apartment is 62.4 m2, storage room 3m2, two parking spaces in front of the house, which are visible from the windows of the apartment.

The apartment is very bright, as it is located on three sides. The apartment has an open separate kitchen, a spacious living room, 2 separate bedrooms, a bathroom with a toilet and underfloor heating, an entrance hall.
The apartment has been recently renovated with new floors, ceilings and walls repainted.

The apartment is furnished with high-quality kitchen furniture (oak) with household appliances - refrigerator, oven, ceramic hob, extractor hood, dishwasher. In the hallway there are two comfortable and practical wardrobes.
The apartment has smoke detectors and alarms.

Near the house there are children's playgrounds and a basketball court. See more >>

title: Apartment for sale, 3 rooms Manufaktuuri tn 18, 263 000 EUR
description_full:
Harjumaa, Tallinn, Põhja-Tallinn, Manufaktuuri tn 18, 3 room, 7/9, apartment ownership, 60.5 m², stone house, construction year 2019, ready, ceramic stove, shower, new sewerage, central heating, kitchen, open kitchen, refridgerator, Internet, terrace, parking free parking, packet windows, wall cupboard, separate rooms, public transport, farm building, urban water, dressing room, ventilation, washing machine, lift, furnishing possibility, furniture, parquet, neighbourhood watch, security system, frontdoor locked, roof tar paper roof, 263 000 EUR 4347.11 EUR/m2
Apartment with beautiful views in Manufaktuuri quarter for sale!

The new apartment building was completed in 2019. The developer of the buildings and the quarter is Hepsor AS.

PLAN
The 3-room apartment with beautiful views is located on the 7th floor of the building. The apartment has a spacious and well-thought-out layout. Modern, high-quality interior finishing and technical solutions.

A spacious hallway with a wardrobe with a very stylish and practical design. A living room with floor-to-ceiling windows offering views across the city.
The living room with an open kitchen is well planned and practically furnished. High-quality and stylish kitchen furniture with integrated kitchen appliances.

Two bedrooms, the larger of which has a built-in spacious wardrobe.

A spacious shower room, in which there is comfortable space even with the family.

VENTILATION AND HEATING
The apartment has ventilation with heat recovery and the heating source is a water floor heating system. The building has been issued energy class B (energy class C based on actual consumption data).

CONSTRUCTION INFORMATION
The apartment has oak parquet, triple-glazed plastic windows.
The walls have light colors.

The building's corridor and entrance are spacious. There is a path to the elevator without steps, so it is convenient to move, e.g. with a baby carriage.

STORAGE
The storage room is conveniently located on the first full floor of the building and has a size of 2.2m2 (included in the price).

PARKING SPOT
The price of the apartment includes a parking space in a secure parking garage next to the building on the third floor. (the parking space is registered in the land register as a separate apartment property).

LANDSCAPING
The Manufaktuuri quarter is located in the historic Balti Manufaktuuri area between Sõle, Sitsi and Kopli streets, which has developed into a complete living environment with various leisure opportunities. The house is one of the four Sitsi Úunaaed residential buildings, in the middle of the inner quarter there is an apple orchard of nearly 5000 m2. In the courtyard there are 2 children's playgrounds, table tennis tables, a basketball court, benches, beautiful paths, which all together form a beautiful and friendly living environment.

HISTORY OF THE MANUFACTURING QUARTER
The buildings of the Manufactory quarter include a number of different buildings protected as cultural monuments, which, together with the surrounding apple orchard and ancient park trees, form a unique environmentally valuable environment. The quarter's history dates back to 1898, when Emperor Nicholas II approved the charter of the Baltic Cotton Spinning and Knitting Factory.
In 1900, the 234-meter-long, four-story main building designed by Rudolf Otto von Knüpffer was completed in the area between Telliskopli road and the sea, to which a limestone wing building was added in 1908. Various extensions were gradually added during almost the entire history of the factory. Production reached its peak between the two world wars in 1928-1929, when the number of workers reached 2,000. In addition to cloth, various types of yarn and cotton wool were also produced. In 1940, the factory was nationalized by the Soviet authorities, and in 1941, the factory burned down in the whirlwind of war. In 1945, restoration work began, and the factory resumed production the following year. The production of raw cotton fabric and thread continued throughout the Soviet period. In the 1990s, after the restoration of Estonia's independence, the manufactory was acquired by Tolaram Grupp, production ended due to the pressure of the changed economic environment in 2006. Before closing the factory building, Tolaram Grupp started to prepare a detailed plan of the entire area in order to design the area into an up-to-date living and business quarter. The first fruit of this is the Sits apple garden quarter (with 269 apartments), which was completed in 2014-2019 in cooperation between Hepsor and Tolaram. In the same cooperation, the development of the rest of the factory area will continue

LOCATION
The location is only 3 kilometers from the heart of the city. It takes 6-10 minutes to reach the city center by car, 12-20 minutes by public transport, 10 minutes by bicycle, 30 minutes by foot. There is a public transport stop (200m), several grocery stores, a school and a kindergarten nearby. Stroomi beach and beach park and Rocca al Mare-Stromi beach promenade, Merimetsa park forest and health trails, Sõle sports center are within walking distance. * great location/developing area: good and developed infrastructure, sandy beach nearby, city center 10 minutes by car. See more >>

title: Apartment for sale, 4 rooms Kopli tn 64, 381 612 EUR
address: Harjumaa Tallinn Põhja-<b>Tallinn Kalamaja Kopli tn 64 3
description_full:
Harjumaa, Tallinn, Põhja-Tallinn, Kalamaja, Kopli tn 64-3, 4 room, 1/3, 82.6 m², construction year 2022, all brand-new, sauna, shower, õhksoojuspump, open kitchen, separate entryway, closed courtyard, packet windows, parquet, box-room, new electricity, high ceilings, video cameras, 381 612 EUR 4620.00 EUR/m2
7 REASONS TO CHOOSE KALAMAJA PARK RESIDENCE

1. Great location
2. Enclosed yard for pleasant gatherings
3. Class A energy efficiency
4. Convenient transport connection
5. Exclusive finish
6. Friendly neighbors
7. Solar panels

LOCATION
Kalamaja Park Residence is located at Kopli 64 in the historic wooden house area, away from high-rise buildings and heavy traffic. Inspired by the local architecture, we have created the exterior facade of the house, which harmoniously connects with the infrastructure of the area. Here you will forget that you are in the city center: close to shopping malls, educational institutions and entertainment venues. It gives a special feeling of peace and harmony to the place. A video surveillance system, a sufficient number of parking spaces and a secure yard provide security.

DESCRIPTION OF THE HOUSE
The exterior façade is made of expensive finishing materials, such as planed façade boards in three shades of gray, high-quality Caparol plaster. The apartment building is a stone house on a ribbon foundation. The ceilings are made of reinforced concrete slabs. The outer walls are made of COLUMBIA 190 blocks. The inner walls between the apartments are made of COLUMBIA 240. The partitions are made of both gypsum and AEROC blocks. Coziness and comfort in the apartments is achieved thanks to high ceilings. The ceiling height of the first and second floors are 2600 mm. The height of the rooms on the fourth floor is 3500 mm. This house features 2 unique attic apartments on the upper floors with unusual windows and high ceilings.

FINISHING
Only first-class materials have been used in the interior finishing: natural oak parquet, Italian tiles, Hansgrohe sanitary ware. The price also includes kitchen furniture from Kraus Köögid in the amount of 2000 euros.

ENERGY SAVING AND COMFORT
The house is excellently insulated and has energy saving class A. A high-quality air-to-water heat pump has been installed to heat the apartments. The room temperature is set in each room using separate sensors. The apartments are heated by underfloor heating. The house maintains the right microclimate and ensures the supply of fresh warm air thanks to the supply and exhaust ventilation unit.

THE PRICE OF THE APARTMENT INCLUDES:
1. Interior design package White
2. Kitchen furniture from the company Kraus Köögid in the amount of 2000 euros
3. Connection to sewerage and water supply
4. Electrical connection
5. Readiness for connection to the telephone network and cable television
6. Readiness to join a security company
7. VAT

THE PRICE DOES NOT INCLUDE:
1. The sale price of the property does not include notary fees and state duty (paid by the Buyer)
2. Payment for connection to a communication service, a security company and cable TV
3. Furniture (in bathrooms, nurseries, bedrooms, etc.)
4. Hanging ceiling lights
5. Interior design package Black
6. Parking space
7. Storage room

Check out the project https://bit.ly/3wSZz1A See more >>

Free kitchen with the purchase of a Volta Residence home!

Campaign terms and conditions:

- During the campaign period, you will receive 8 000€ worth of kitchen furniture from Idema (Samiks OÜ) with the purchase of a 1-2-room apartment at Volta Residences.

- During the campaign period, you will receive 12 000€ worth of kitchen furniture from Idema (Samiks OÜ) with the purchase of a 3-4-room apartment at Volta Residences.

The campaign is valid for reservations made from 16.08.22 to 30.09.22.

- The campaign applies once a notarised contract for the transfer of the ownership of the apartment has been signed.

- One campaign offer / discount per one apartment at a time.


Building is due to be finished already in winter!

We sell a wide selection of 2-room apartments with the ceiling height up to 3m!

Your new home is located on the south side of the building.
When stepping in to the apartment, you'll have the possibility to leave your outwear to the spacious wardrobe. You also have the access to your personal household room from the corridor. You have on bedroom in the apartment and a private, 5,4m2 big balcony with the access from your living room.

VOLTA RESIDENCES

Energy-level "A"
Most of the apartments have a terrace, balcony or roof-top terrace
Ultra-modern minimalistic intrustrial achitecture
Black squared windows
Multi-level layouts in the loft apartments
Architecture by highly regarded KOKO architects
Under-ground parking
Solar-panels on the roofs

APARTMENTS

Ceilings up to 3m in height
Loft apartments boast ceilings of up to 5.4m in height
Penthouse apartments with views to the Old Town
Premium interior finishing
Floorplans by the highly regarded interior designer Aet Piel
Floor-heating and heat-recovery ventilation

LOCATION

Volta Residences are located in the most stylish mixed-use residential and business area. Volta quarter is going to be reinveted - the old is submerged with new. Old historical buildings are reconstructed and new stylish residential and commercial buildings are integrated in the Volta Quarter.

The Volta Quarter is located just between the sea and the Old Town in the neighbourhood of Kalamaja, highly regarded for its culture and entertainment scene. The most beautiful park in Kalamaja is just across the road as well as the vibrant Noblessner yacht harbour with prestigious gourmet restaurants. From here the Kalaranna St commences to provide fast connections with downtown. Right on your doorstep you’ll find the Arsenal shopping centre, which is home to the Selver supermarket as well as cafés and boutiques.

The whole Quarter id developed by Endover.

All pictures and visualizations are illustrative.

title: Apartment for sale, 3 rooms Kihnu tn 18, 129 000 EUR
description_full:
Harjumaa, Tallinn, Lasnamäe, Kihnu tn 18, 3 room, 4/9, apartment ownership, 62.4 m², panel house, construction year 1990, TV-set, separate rooms, furnishing possibility, furniture, packet windows, parquet, lift, parking free parking, 129 000 EUR 2067.31 EUR/m2
CONVINIENT LAYOUT! NEAR TONDIRABA PARK!

FLAT
Entering the apartment, you find yourself in the hallway, from which a corridor leads to all rooms. The living room is very spacious and bright. The kitchen is modern and equipped with all necessary appliances. The bedroom is located at the far end of the apartment. A separate room is well suited for both a nursery and an office. The windows of the living room and children's room overlook a quiet courtyard. Toilet and bathroom are separated.

The apartment was renovated (2 years ago). The floor is covered with laminate, the walls are leveled and the windows and doors are replaced.

LOCATION
The apartment is located in a very convenient part of the area. Everything you need: kindergartens, schools, sports clubs (My Fitness, HC-GYM, Fitness24, Lemon GYM) and shops (Rimi, Maxima XX, Prisma, COOP) within walking distance. Fast and convenient public transport connection to the city center (buses number 29, 63, 172, 12, 60, 65 and 31).
Next to the house is the new largest protected park in Estonia - "TONIDIRABA", where you can enjoy an evening walk, jog or have fun in playgrounds with children.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
Utility bills are very reasonable both in winter and summer.
The neighbors are very friendly and there is an active camaraderie in the house.
Parking for residents of the house is free.
Video surveillance is installed in the surrounding area.

title: Commercial premises for rent, warehouse, industry, catering, industry, warehouse, service, trade, office, 1,130.6 m² Narva mnt , 6 218.30 EUR
description_full:
Harjumaa, Tallinn, Lasnamäe, Narva mnt, total area 1,130.6 m², plot area 2.0 ha, 1/2, private property, all brand-new, construction year 2022, gas heating, Internet, parking free parking, ventilation, separate entryway, street entrance, show case windows, water, electricity, furnishing possibility, conditioner, video cameras, neighbourhood watch, frontdoor locked, steel door, fenced with garden, security system, location in the center location, roads in good condition roads, 6 218.30 EUR 5.50 EUR/m2
SPECIAL OFFER! If you sign the contract before the end of October, you can use your rental premises for free for the first two months.

NEW PREMISES AT THE END OF NARVA STREET!
CONSTRUCTION IS IN FULL SWING!
The building will be ready in fall. Vana-Narva Road's reconstruction will be finished in July.

See more at: iruarikeskus.favorte.ee/en

Iru Business Centre is a new two-storey warehouse-office-agency or stock-office type of house by Vana-Narva Road. This three-in-one solution gives the enterprise an opportunity to bring the entire business activity under one roof and due to that save on logistics, communications, personnel and ancillary costs.

We lease commercial premises with the total area of 1130,6 m2 of which 160,2 m2 is meant for office/trading area and 970,4 m2 for production and/or warehouse area. In Iru Business Centre we also offer other commercial spaces with the total area of 350–1130 m2 and when connected you can create business premises with the area of about 9500 m2. The proportion of the warehouse/production area and the office/trading area can be adjusted according to the requirements of the enterprise! Contact us to find a suitable room solution for you!

All free premises in Iru Business Centre for lease (Vana-Narva mnt 3)

Commercial area 2: trading/office area 133,4 m2; production/warehouse area 366,0 m2; total area 499,4 m2; rent 3146,22 EUR
Commercial area 5: trading/office area 153,5 m2; production/warehouse area 658,3 m2; total area 811,8 m2; rent 4708,44 EUR
Commercial area 6: trading/office area 130,5 m2; production/warehouse area 628,6 m2; total area 759,1 m2; rent 4402,78 EUR
Commercial area 7: trading/office area 160,2 m2; production/warehouse area 970,4 m2; total area 1130,6 m2; rent 6218,30 EUR
Commercial area 8: trading/office area 135,7 m2; production/warehouse area 948 m2; total area 1083,7 m2; rent 5960,35 EUR
Commercial area 10: trading/office area 54,2 m2; production/warehouse area 791,5 m2; total area 845,7 m2; rent 4566,78 EUR
Commercial area 11: trading/office area 130,6 m2; production/warehouse area 789,4 m2; total area 920 m2; rent 5060 EUR
Commercial area 12: trading/office area 107,7 m2; production/warehouse area 786,7 m2; total area 894,4 m2; rent 4919,20 EUR

LOCATION

Iru Business Centre is located in Maardu near Tallinn, at a two minutes’ driving distance from the Lasnamäe District. The vicinity of Vana-Narva Road is a well-developed area with good technological and social infrastructure and many production enterprises have found a suitable place nearby.

Maardu-Iru area is facing total reconstruction in the coming years – the remodelling of Vana-Narva Road and Saha-Loo Road junction has already started. This includes the road right in front of Iru Ärikeskus. A new street with freshly paved asphalt and safe exit routes will be ready by this September!

Today, almost 10 000 vehicles a day use Vana-Narva Road and thanks to the reconstruction, this number will be on the rise. The completion of Väo traffic junction also complements the smooth operation of roads near Maardu and the major transport roads in the surrounding area.

Thanks to the completion of said long-term infrastructure projects, the potential of the area increases among production and logistics enterprises. Nonetheless, the Maardu-Iru area has always been a good location logistically – in addition to the nearby railroad branches, Narva Road and Tallinn roundabout, the freshly reconstructed Muuga Harbour is only a 10-minutes car drive away. The harbour’s trade turnover is about 40% of all transit goods passing through Estonia.

In close proximity are businesses for convenient worklife – Pärnamäe Keskus with Rimi foodstore, Alexela gas station, Mündipesula car wash and multiple cafes are a 3-minute drive away; a bit closer are Al’s Cafe, Sillburger diner and Neste gas station.

The location of the business centre by major roads provides the lessees with good logistics options.

- Along Saha-Loo Road you can reach Peterburi Road fast in order to head for the direction of Narva.

- From the same point the Tallinn roundabout starts and opens a convenient way towards the westward settlements like Paldiski and Keila without a need to drive through the city and to Tartu Road.

- Along Pärnamäe and Muuga Road a smooth access to Muuga Harbour is guaranteed.

- Thanks to the vicinity of Peterburi, Laagna and Pärnamäe Roads there are fast ways to reach different districts of Tallinn.

- At a two minutes’ walking distance from Iru Business Centre there is Vasara bus stop serviced by bus line no. 30 of Tallinn.

SITES AND ROADS LOCATED NEARBY
Lasnamäe 2 min / Saha-Loo Road 1 min
Peterburi Road 3 min / Tallinn roundabout 3 min
Laagna Road 6 min / City Centre 18 min
Muuga Harbour 12 min / Muuga 5 min
Ülemiste 16 min / Tartu Road 17 min
Paldiski 54 min / Keila 38 min
Vasara bus stop on foot 2 min

In Iru Business Centre modern and energy-efficient solutions are used.
- Modern and high-resolution security cameras on the perimeter of the building
- Programmable access systems
- Surveillance of the leased premises
- Energy-efficient LED light fittings
- Illuminated advertising on the façade of the building
- Premises-based heating regulation
- Heat recovery ventilation in the office
- Big storage height and possibility to store goods on different surfaces
- Smart warehouse – follow the events taking place in front of the camera at distance and manage the overhead door and the surveillance system by the mobile phone application.
- Possibility to move the goods through the building; in by one door and out by another door
- Roundabout and comfortable loading and manoeuvring for big cargo trucks
- Personal parking places

The energy efficiency of the building is characterised by low ancillary costs. The office and warehouse premises of Iru Business Centre enable the future lessee to use the leased premises effectively. The room solution in the commercial centre can be adjusted according to the lessee’s requirements and for one or several lessees.

The net area for lease in Iru Business Centre is about 9489 m2; the building will be finished in fall 2022.

For more information see the homepage of the project: iruarikeskus.favorte.ee/en

Ask for a personal offer!
